entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 50

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
